message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I really appreciate it.  $175 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you be willing to come down to $125?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $175 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm still looking for a good price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $150.
